players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Let's work together to solve this case. I am innocent, but that doesn't mean the mafia is not among us. Bob, Charlie, can you share any information or suspicions you might have?"
Bob: "Charlie, I have a few questions for you. Can you tell me more about your actions last night? What did you do and where were you?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
